title: Wotum nieufnosci
overview: Following the resignation of the President of the Republic of Poland, Sejm Marshal Daria Seyda hopes to take his place. Daria's main opponent in the fight for the presidency is Patryk Hauer - the rising star of the right. He cares about his image in the media and his position in the party. Milena's wife supports him in all his professional endeavors. During the work of the investigative commission, Hauer discovers a political conspiracy involving the most important people in power. Seyda and Hauer are on opposite sides of the political scene. They share everything, but they share the same goal - to discover and reveal who is behind the conspiracy.
